articles.content:
JONESBORO, Ark. (KAIT) - Well, we all know it is hot outside.
Heat warnings have been in effect across the area for the past couple of days. This caused many of us to run our air conditioners in our… [+712 chars]

articles.title: LAX bans single-use plastic water bottles to reduce waste - KTLA Los Angeles
articles.description: Beginning Friday, travelers will no longer be able to purchase plastic water bottles at the Los Angeles International Airport, officials announced.  Airport officials tweeted, “Effective today, LAX will ban the sale of single-use plastic water bottles.”  The …
